author: Redparis2017
title: location, safety, hospitality, cost performance were more than what I'd expected
text:
It was the third time for me to stay in Paris, but for the first time to stay at the area of "Musee d'Orsay". My priority of this trip was : first safety, and second location. Comparing with the Opera area (my previous staying), the place was very quiet, within easy access of Mus√©e du Louvre,de l'Orangeri.Hotel d'Orsay was perfect, and gave me peaceful and comfortable time in Paris.
Room Tip: compact, safe, clean, quiet, good bedclothes and amenities See more room tips
